REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2840 reute h f BC-UNIVATION-INC-<UNIV> 03-24 0049

TEXT.TITLE: UNIVATION INC <UNIV> EXPANDS EUROPE DISTRIBUTION
TEXT.BODY: Univation Inc said it has entered marketing agreements with eight major European distributors in seven countries. The company said the agreements are expected to yield ten mln dlrs in sales in the next 18 months. Reuter
